snippet: Jimmie Johnson took control of Nascar’s championship battle after a disastrous performance by Matt Kenseth at Phoenix International Raceway.
abstract: Jimmie Johnson widens lead over Matt Kenseth in Nascar’s Sprint Cup championship battle after Kenseth's disastrous performance at Phoenix International Raceway.
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson took control of Nascar’s championship battle after a disastrous performance by Matt Kenseth at Phoenix International Raceway.

headline.main: Johnson Widens Lead as Kenseth Struggles
headline.print_headline: Johnson Widens Lead As Kenseth Struggles
